alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 3:26PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central San Diego County through 415 PM PDT... At 325 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hwy 78 Between Ramona And Santa Ysabel, or near Julian, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alpine, Cuyamaca Rancho State Park, Julian, Hwy 78 Between Ramona And Santa Ysabel, Descanso, Lake Cuyamaca, San Diego Country Estates, Boulder Creek, Captain Grande Indian Reservation, Santa Ysabel, Wynola and Santa Ysabel Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
